title: Blended Learning Program for Improving Argumentative Writing Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A blended learning program combining offline collaborative activities and online writing tasks, designed to strengthen argumentative writing competencies for graduate students in social sciences

learning_goals: Learners can deliver a 3-hour oral presentation with logical and coherent arguments on complex social issues
Learners can complete a 1,500-character argumentative essay using academic argumentation structures
Learners can identify and revise at least three logical gaps in their writing based on peer feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
